channel.title: Leaked FOCR (Furby OCR) or ELMO (ocr 1.1) source, anyone still have it?
channel.description:
As we all remember, back in the days RichyT paid a programmer $500 for a working RSC OCR. Later he banned an admin on his forum (Bight or something) who then leaked the source to this masterpiece. Soon after people started releasing their own OCRs based on FOCR, which ruined RichyT's business.
The questions is, does anyone still have it? I'd like to take a look at it.
Or the one mentioned here http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,155800.msg1468832.html#msg1468832

Read full topic

item.title: Leaked FOCR (Furby OCR) or ELMO (ocr 1.1) source, anyone still have it?
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

[quote=“Man UTD Freak, post:9, topic:295473”][quote author=runescape3dude link=topic=391475.msg2916083#msg2916083 date=1250452165]
What exactly is an OCR?
[/quote]

Of what I have researched of it an OCR is an abbreviation of Optical Character Recognition and translates text of some sort mechanically or electronically into machine-editable text captured most often by a scanner.[/quote]

This is a gem.

Read full topic
